archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.1.1: Business (including information security) requirements for systems under development should be documented in a specification of business requirements (or equivalent) and supported by an agreed process for handling changes to requirements.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
